--- title: "Annotations" date: "2023-10-16" date_end: "2023-10-20" --- ## Readings - {{< fa book >}} [Chapter 17](https://clauswilke.com/dataviz/redundant-coding.html), [Chapter 18](https://clauswilke.com/dataviz/multi-panel-figures.html), [Chapter 19](https://clauswilke.com/dataviz/figure-titles-captions.html), and [Chapter 21](https://clauswilke.com/dataviz/small-axis-labels.html) in *Fundamentals of Data Visualization* [@Wilke:2018] - {{< fa book >}} [Chapter 5](http://socviz.co/workgeoms.html) in *Data Visualization* [@Healy:2018] - {{< fa arrow-up-right-from-square >}} Cara Thompson, ["Level Up Your Labels: Tips and Tricks for Annotating Plots"](https://www.cararthompson.com/talks/user2022) ## Slides The slides for this week's lesson are available online as an HTML file. Use the buttons below to open the slides either as an interactive website or as a static PDF (for printing or storing for later). You can also click in the slides below and navigate through them with your left and right arrow keys.

View all slides in new window Download PDF of all slides

::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: :::{.callout-tip} **Fun fact**: If you type ? (or shift + /) while going through the slides, you can see a list of special slide-specific commands. ::: ## Videos Videos for each section of the lecture are [available at this YouTube playlist](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLS6tnpTr39sG4NCNqLqHhIE7khPgrdRJD). - [Introduction](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1c51k2tmjBI&list=PLS6tnpTr39sG4NCNqLqHhIE7khPgrdRJD) - [Fretting the little things](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6p4K5_6KU9k&list=PLS6tnpTr39sG4NCNqLqHhIE7khPgrdRJD) - [Text in plots](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fdR78oXb_fI&list=PLS6tnpTr39sG4NCNqLqHhIE7khPgrdRJD) - [Seeds](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lV_Qak75E6I&list=PLS6tnpTr39sG4NCNqLqHhIE7khPgrdRJD) You can also watch the playlist (and skip around to different sections) here:
